entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
